Functions

{% raw %}

say_hello[source]

say_hello(to)

say hello do to someone

{% endraw %}

We can say Bonjiorno to anyone, but we will say Bonjiorno to Joe here.

{% raw %} 
say_hello("Joe")

'Bonjiorno Joe'
{% endraw %}

Classes

{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class HelloSayer[source]

HelloSayer(to)

Say hello to to using say_hello

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

HelloSayer.say[source]

HelloSayer.say()

Do the saying

{% endraw %}

Example

{% raw %} 
joe = HelloSayer("Guiseppe")
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
joe.say()

'Bonjiorno Guiseppe'
{% endraw %}
